Bolles Flugschule (Bolle’s Flying School) takes children on an exciting round trip through the Berlin skyline. Whether they opt for the double-decker planes or an airship, they are sure to love this action-packed ride full of ups and downs.

title: MUSARTEUM
description:
** This show cannot take place for the time being. **

The Wintergarten Theatre has long been the home of multi-award-winning shows. “MUSARTEUM – Die Show zur Geisterstunde” (MUSARTEUM – The Ghosting Hour Show) is anything but a peaceful evening performance. The museum’s ghouls put on a show full of breathtaking artistry, evocative songs and dynamic dance for a night of entertainment that is out of this world.

Length: approx. 40 minutes

title: Pirates in 4D
description:
A one-of-a-kind film experience! “Pirates in 4D” will catapult you right into the heart of an incredible adventure under the skull and crossbones flag. Climb aboard with the comedy legend Leslie Nielsen for an extremely tempestuous treasure hunt. Ahoy! 
Note: The movie is in German language only.

Length: approx 20 minutes

title: Gästeservice | Club-Center
description:
Our guest relations team are on hand to help with information, questions or suggestions. This is where you will find our ticket and voucher sales points and our lost property office. We will also measure your children and mark their height on a special armband. Simply present the band at the rides and we’ll be able to tell you straight away whether they are eligible to ride or not. No further measurements required.

---
Distance and hygiene rules:
---
** Note minimum distance **
** Mouth-nose protection **

title: ATM
description: Found the ideal souvenir or fancy treating your friends and family to one last ice cream? If you are running low on cash, don’t panic! You will find a cash point run by the bank “Kreissparkasse Köln” next door to Kaisersnack.

title: Family-Service
description:
The Family Service centre provides information, tips, and a wide range of services especially for families. It also has a separate breastfeeding area, a changing area and kettle for heating baby bottles. The centre also hands out free kids’ armbands where you can make a note of your child’s name and your telephone number. This means we can call you at any time should you lose sight of anyone.

---
Distance and hygiene rules:

title: QUANTUM
description: QUANTUM is a state-of-the-art venue with an incredible atmosphere; it’s the ideal blank canvas for an array of events. Equipped with cutting-edge technology, this venue helps you to make a statement and give your guests an exclusive day they won’t forget.

title: Jafari Bar
description:
** The Li River Bar is open for our hotel guests. **

The hotel’s lobby is a great place to relax and unwind over a speciality tea or coffee, cocktail or our range of spirits. Whether you decide to soak in the tropical views from the garden terrace or settle down next to our cosy fire, Jafari Bar is the ideal place to relax, African-style.

title: Restaurant Bantu
tagline: The African Lodge in Hotel Matamba
description:
** For the time being, we cannot welcome guests without a hotel reservation in Restaurant Bantu. **
** To visit the Bantu Restaurant, table reservations are required in advance. **

Take a journey of discovery through South African à-la carte cuisine or try a fondue with a wide array of African meats, poultry and fish. Built in the style of a traditional lodge, this restaurant boasts sensational views over the tropical gardens.

title: Restaurant Zambesi
tagline: The African Barbecue in Hotel Matamba
description:
** For the time being, we cannot welcome guests without a hotel reservation in Restaurant Zambesi. **
** To visit the Zambesi Restaurant, table reservations are required in advance. **

Explore a wealth of rich flavours on this culinary safari and enjoy traditional African dishes with a subtle international twist. At the live cooking area, you can have exotic fish and meat specialities prepared freshly on the grill. There is also a special kids’ buffet for your little ones.

title: Restaurant Bamboo
tagline: The Food Market in Hotel Ling Bao
description:
** For the time being, we cannot welcome guests without a hotel reservation in Restaurant Bamboo. **
** To visit the Bamboo Restaurant, table reservations are required in advance. **

Take an incredible journey through Asian cuisine and discover the diversity of Chinese cooking. There is also a special kids’ offer for your little ones.

title: Restaurant Lu Chi
tagline: Casual Fine Dining in Hotel Ling Bao
description:
** For the time being, we cannot welcome guests without a hotel reservation in Restaurant Bamboo. **
** To visit the Bamboo Restaurant, table reservations are required in advance. **

Allow yourself to be pampered in the amazing ambience and enjoy our amazing creations that combine the best of various Asian dishes.

title: Li River Bar
description:
** The Li River Bar is open for our hotel guests. **

The perfect place to recharge your batteries in a relaxing Asian ambience. Whether you opt for the garden terrace or the cosy fireplace, treat yourself with our tea and coffee specialities, cocktails, spirits menu and exotic drinks.

title: Dragon Bar
tagline: Rooftop Bar in Hotel Ling Bao
description:
** The Dragon Bar will be open for our hotel guests. **

Superior surroundings and the ideal place to ring out the day with a view over Phantasialand. The roof terrace at Hotel Ling Bao serves international cocktails, a range of spirits, selected wines and lots more!

title: Marco Polo
description: Der rotundenartige Bau versprüht den Hauch von Abenteuer. Steigen Sie empor über die breite Treppe und spätestens nach dem Öffnen des massiven Holztors verspüren Sie den Wunsch, den Spuren Marco Polos zu folgen. Staunen Sie über die majestätischen Fabelwesen, die sich in der Mitte des Baus erheben und genießen Sie Ihr Gänsehautfeeling.

title: Waffelbäckerei
description:
In the waffle shop, you can choose from a range of different waffles with a whole host of toppings. These sweet treats are served straight from the waffle iron. Bon appetit!

---
Distance and hygiene rules:
---
** Note minimum distance **
** Mouth-nose protection **

title: STOCK's
description: Loft-style, industrial chic with vintage flair and a touch of the Bronx – STOCK’s venue has been lovingly created and features a distinctive ambience and top-class equipment. STOCK’s has space for up to 450 people.

title: Information monitor
description: The central queue time screens show a list of the current waiting times for attractions. We also provide information regarding the current opening times of waiting areas.

title: Parkzugang Hotel Ling Bao
description: Das asiatische Themenhotel Ling Bao ist nach der Harmonielehre des Feng Shui errichtet und bietet dir Ruhe und Erholung für Körper und Geist. Fernöstliche Klänge, exotische Düfte und original asiatisches Mobiliar: Hier tauchst du ins Reich der Mitte ein. Ob mit oder ohne Hotelübernachtung: In den Restaurants Lu Chi und Bamboo sowie in der Li River Bar und Dragon Bar gehst du auf fernöstliche Genussreise!

title: First aid station
description: In our first-aid station you get everything you need if you have injured yourself in our park or if you don't feel well. Did you hit your knee or do you need a cool pack? No problem, our paramedics are there for you! Of course, you can always contact our staff directly on site, who will help you with words and deeds.

title: Lockers
description: We make your life easier! There’s no need to lug all your belongings around Phantasialand all day. We provide lockers for a small charge. They are safe place to store your things, making it easier for you to enjoy a phantastic day out.

title: Park access Hotel Matamba
tagline: Private access to the theme park
description: In the tropical hotel garden you walk through the private access directly into the theme world Deep in Africa. Thus the adventure Africa in Phantasialand continues seamlessly!

title: Hotel Charles Lindbergh
description: Become an Explorer – as deep in the heart of a theme world as nowhere else: In the only hotel in the world that completly merges with an attraction, you get closer to the skystormers of F.L.Y. than anyone else – and experience exclusively Rookburgh in its impressive totality.

title: Boarding Gate Rookburgh
description: The very private access to the Rookburgh theme world for guests of the Hotel Charles Lindbergh. Real explorers enter a world beyond all imagination with their personal boarding pass!

title: 1919 – Bar. Pub. Destillery.
tagline: Exklusive Bar in Hotel Charles Lindbergh
description: Cocktails and craft beer, billiards and darts, laughter and bliss: The Bar 1919 is home to extraordinary pleasures and a sense of security full of character. An adventure by night - exclusively for guests of the Hotel Charles Lindbergh.

title: Restaurant Uhrwerk
description: Homemade. Handmade. Delightful! With gorgeous burgers, exceptional pasta and hearty French fries scoops with exquisite toppings, you can taste the true spirit of adventure of Rookburgh. This is pleasure with craftsmanship and heart!

title: Zum Kohleschipper
description: Small boiler house, great delight! The Kohleschipper combines grilled toppings and exquisite ingredients to five homemade sandwich creations. Whether "Ham & Egg" or "Salmon & Chili" - always with your own type of bread and always warm.

title: Emilie’s Chocoladen & Candy-Werkstatt
description: Welcome to Rookburgh's land of plenty: Candys in fantastic variety in your own favorite mix. Handmade chocolates, made on site with amazing toppings. Full of craftsmanship and class, these sweet treats are always worth a sin.

title: F.L.Y.
description:
Conquer the skies with F.L.Y. - the first Flying Launch Coaster in the world! Swish breathtakingly close through the Rookburgh theme world and the Hotel Charles Lindbergh. Feel the fascinating freedom of flying. A worldwide unique flight experience that makes dreams come true.

---
Distance and hygiene rules:
---
** Minimum distance in the waiting area **
** Mouth-nose protection **
** No free seating choice **

title: Restrooms
description: At this point you will find our restrooms. These are of course also available for children as children's toilets in the appropriate size.

title: Portal Berlin
tagline: Access to the Rookburgh theme world
description: Travelers from Berlin enter the visionary world of Rookburgh through this gate. An extraordinary reception in the form of an impressive subway station - into a place that redefines adventure!

title: Karimbu Bar
description: In the shade of the Black Mamba you enjoy the spirit of Africa - with an ice-cold African lager beer, refreshing soft drinks or sun-drenched wines.
